mapper.insert: insert into trades(order_id, owner_name, counter_party, wantname, wantamount, givename, giveamount, execution_time) value(#{order_id}, #{owner_name},#{counter_party},#{wantname},#{wantamount}, #{givename},#{giveamount},#{execution_time});
mapper.select: select * from trades order by execution_time desc limit 50
select * from trades where wantname='Bitcoin' and givename='Litecoin' union select * from trades where wantname='Litecoin' and givename='Bitcoin' order by execution_time desc limit 1;
